TopicTitle: Suggestion: Please add HDR in future. Perfect for space game and FALD monitors.

Articles.Content:
For those that don't use OLED's for productivity (because they don't want to risk burn-in or other reasons) a lot of people have opted for dual purpose FALD monitors. FALD monitors typically won't run FALD properly with SDR because most algorithms require HDR to use it properly. This means that without HDR natively supported (not fake HDR enabled in Windows) the population of FALD monitor/TV owners can't see the beautiful black of space along with the powerful sun glares or even runway lights in future.

Solution: Since Unity natively supports HDR, can you please consider adding it in the future?
